description:
A library that can easily provide threaded execution of SQL statements and commands. It can be used to expose an interface to Microsoft Excel clients, providing threaded, async operations to a single-thread application.

Examples:

Simplifies SQL execution, encapsulating construction, execution, and destruction of SQL elements.
summary: Threaded execution of SQL statements and commands, and with a fa√ßade, exposed to Microsoft Excel clients.
title: SQL Execution
